verses.verse: And<WG1161> he spoke<WG3004><WG99999> a parable<WG3850> unto them<WG846><WG99999> to this end<WG1163>, that men should always<WG3842> pray<WG4336>, and<WG2532> not<WG3361> faint<WG1573>;
Saying<WG3004>, There was<WG2258> in<WG1722> a<WG5100> city<WG4172> a judge<WG2923>, which<WG5100> feared<WG5399> not<WG3361> God<WG2316>, neither<WG3361><WG99999> regarded<WG1788> man<WG444>:

And<WG1161> there was<WG2258> a widow<WG5503> in<WG1722> that<WG1565> city<WG4172>; and<WG2532> she came<WG2064> to<WG4314> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Avenge<WG1556> me<WG3165> of<WG575> my<WG3450> adversary<WG476>.

And<WG2532> he would<WG2309> not<WG3756> for<WG1909> a while<WG5550>: but<WG1161> afterward<WG3326><WG99999> he said<WG2036> inside<WG1722> himself<WG1438>, Though<WG1487><WG99999> I fear<WG5399> not<WG3756> God<WG2532>, nor<WG3756> regard<WG1788> man<WG444>;

Yet<WG1065> because<WG1223> this<WG3778> widow<WG5503> troubles<WG3930><WG99999> me<WG3427>, I will avenge<WG1556> her<WG2443>, lest<WG3361> by<WG1519> her<WG2064> continual<WG5056> coming<WG2064> she weary<WG5299> me<WG3165>.
And<WG1161> the Lord<WG2962> said<WG2036>, Hear<WG191> what<WG5101> the unjust<WG93> judge<WG2923> says<WG3004>.

And<WG1161> shall<WG1557> not<WG3364> God<WG2316> avenge<WG1557> his own<WG846> elect<WG1588>, which<WG3588> cry<WG994> day<WG2250> and<WG2532> night<WG3571> to<WG4314> him<WG846>, though<WG2532> he is patient<WG3114> concerning<WG1909> them<WG846>?

I tell<WG3004> you<WG5213> that<WG3754> he will<WG4160> avenge<WG1557> them<WG846><WG99999> speedily<WG5034>. Nevertheless when<WG4133> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> comes<WG2064>, shall<WG687> he find<WG2147> faith<WG4102> on<WG1909> the earth<WG1093>?

And<WG1161> he spoke<WG2036><WG99999> this<WG3778> parable<WG3850> to<WG4314> certain<WG5100> people who<WG3588> trusted<WG3982> in<WG1909> themselves<WG1438> that<WG3754> they were<WG1526> righteous<WG1342>, and<WG2532> despised<WG1848> others<WG3062>:
Two<WG1417> men<WG444> went up<WG305> into<WG1519> the temple<WG2411> to pray<WG4336>; the one<WG1520> a Pharisee<WG5330>, and<WG2532> the other<WG2087> a tax collector<WG5057>.

The Pharisee<WG5330> stood<WG2476> and prayed<WG4336> thus<WG5023> with<WG4314> himself<WG1438>, God<WG2316>, I thank<WG2168> you<WG4671>, that<WG3754> I am<WG1510> not<WG3756> as<WG5618> other<WG3062> men<WG444> are<WG727>, extortioners, unjust<WG94>, adulterers<WG3432>, or<WG2228> even<WG2532> as<WG5613> this<WG3778> tax collector<WG5057>.
I fast<WG3522> twice<WG1364> in the week<WG4521>, I give tithes<WG586> of all<WG3956> that<WG3745> I possess<WG2932>.

And<WG2532> the tax collector<WG5057>, standing<WG2476> afar off<WG3113>, would<WG2309> not<WG3756> lift up<WG1869> so much as<WG3761> his eyes<WG3788> to<WG1519> heaven<WG3772>, but<WG235> struck<WG5180> upon<WG1519> his<WG846> breast<WG4738>, saying<WG3004>, God<WG2316> be merciful<WG2433> to me<WG3427> a sinner<WG268>.

I tell<WG3004> you<WG5213>, this man<WG3778> went down<WG2597> to<WG1519> his<WG846> house<WG3624> justified<WG1344> rather than<WG2228> the other<WG1565>: for<WG3754> every one<WG3956> that<WG3588> exalts<WG5312> himself<WG1438> shall be abased<WG5013>; and<WG1161> he that<WG3588> humbles<WG5013> himself<WG1438> shall be exalted<WG5312>.

And<WG1161> they brought<WG4374> to him<WG846> also<WG2532> infants<WG1025>, that<WG2443> he would touch<WG680> them<WG846>: but when<WG1161> his disciples<WG3101> saw<WG1492> it<WG2008>, they rebuked them<WG846>.

But<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> called<WG4341> them<WG846> to him<WG2036>, and said, Allow<WG863> little children<WG3813> to come<WG2064> to<WG4314> me<WG3165>, and<WG2532> forbid<WG2967> them<WG846> not<WG3361>: for<WG1063> of such<WG5108> is<WG2076> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316>.

Truly<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you<WG5213>, Whoever<WG3739> shall<WG1209> not<WG3362> receive<WG1209> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> like<WG5613> a little child<WG3813> shall<WG1525> in<WG3756> no wise<WG3364> enter<WG1525><WG99999> in it<WG846>.
And<WG2532> a certain<WG5100> ruler<WG758> asked<WG1905> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Good<WG18> Master<WG1320>, what<WG5101> shall I do<WG4160> to inherit<WG2816> eternal<WG166> life<WG2816>?
And<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> to him<WG846>, Why<WG5101> call<WG3004> me<WG3165> good<WG18>? None<WG3762> is good<WG18>, save<WG1508> one<WG1520>, that is<WG2316>, God.

You know<WG1492> the commandments<WG1785>, Do<WG3431> not<WG3361> commit adultery<WG3431>, Do<WG5407> not<WG3361> kill<WG5407>, Do<WG2813> not<WG3361> steal<WG2813>, Do<WG5576> not<WG3361> bear false witness<WG5576>, Honor<WG5091> your<WG4675> father<WG3962> and<WG2532> your<WG4675> mother<WG3384>.
And<WG1161> he said<WG2036>, All<WG3956> these<WG5023> have I kept<WG5442> from<WG1537> my<WG3450> youth up<WG3503>.

Now when<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> heard<WG191> these things<WG5023>, he said<WG2036> to him<WG846>, Yet<WG2089> lack<WG3007> you<WG4671> one thing<WG1520>: sell<WG4453> all<WG3956> that<WG3745> you have<WG2192>, and<WG2532> distribute<WG1239> to the poor<WG4434>, and<WG2532> you shall have<WG2192> treasure<WG2344> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>: and<WG2532> come<WG1204>, follow<WG190> me<WG3427>.
And when<WG1161> he heard<WG191> this<WG5023>, he was<WG1096> very sorrowful<WG4036>: for<WG1063> he was<WG2258> very<WG4970> rich<WG4145>.

And when<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> saw that<WG1492> he<WG846> was<WG1096> very sorrowful<WG4036>, he said<WG2036>, How<WG4459> nearly impossible<WG1423> is<WG1525> it for they that<WG3588> have<WG2192> riches<WG5536> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316>!

For<WG1063> it is<WG2076> easier for<WG2123> a camel<WG2574> to go<WG1525> through<WG1223> a needle<WG4476>'s eye<WG5168>, than for<WG2228> a rich man<WG4145> to enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316>.
And<WG1161> they that<WG3588> heard<WG191> it said<WG2036>, Who<WG5101> then<WG2532> can<WG1410> be saved<WG4982>?
And<WG1161> he said<WG2036>, The things which<WG3588> are<WG2076> impossible<WG102> with<WG3844> men<WG444> are possible<WG1415> with<WG3844> God<WG2316>.
Then<WG1161> Peter<WG4074> said<WG2036>, Behold<WG2400>, we<WG2249> have left<WG863> all<WG3956>, and<WG2532> followed<WG190> you<WG4671>.

And<WG1161> he said<WG2036> to them<WG846>, Truly<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you<WG3754>, There is<WG2076> no man<WG3762> that<WG3739> has left<WG863> house<WG3614>, or<WG2228> parents<WG1118>, or<WG2228> brothers<WG80>, or<WG2228> wife<WG1135>, or<WG2228> sons<WG5043>, for<WG1752> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316>'s sake<WG1752>,

Who<WG3739> shall<WG618><WG99999> not<WG3361> receive<WG618> many times more<WG4179> in<WG1722> this<WG5129> present time<WG2540>, and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the world<WG165> to come<WG2064> life<WG2222> everlasting<WG166>.

Then<WG1161> he took<WG3880> to him the twelve<WG1427>, and said<WG2036> to<WG4314> them<WG846>, Behold<WG2400>, we go up<WG305> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414>, and<WG2532> all things<WG3956> that are<WG3588> written<WG1125> by<WG1223> the prophets<WG4396> concerning the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> shall be accomplished<WG5055>.
For<WG1063> he shall be delivered<WG3860> to the Nations<WG1484>, and<WG2532> shall be mocked<WG1702>, and<WG2532> spitefully treated<WG5195>, and<WG2532> spit upon<WG1716>:
And<WG2532> they shall scourge<WG3146> him<WG615>, and put him<WG846> to death<WG615>: and<WG2532> the third<WG5154> day<WG2250> he shall rise again<WG450>.

And<WG2532> they<WG846> understood<WG4920> none<WG3762> of these things<WG5130>: and<WG2532> this<WG5124> saying<WG4487> was<WG2258> hid<WG2928> from<WG575> them<WG2532>, neither<WG3756> knew they<WG1097> the things which<WG3588> were spoken<WG3004>.

And<WG1161> it came to pass<WG1096>, that as<WG1722> he<WG846> was come near<WG1448> to<WG1519> Jericho<WG2410>, a certain<WG5100> blind man<WG5185> sat<WG2521> by<WG3844> the way side<WG3598> begging<WG4319>:
And<WG1161> hearing<WG191> the multitude<WG3793> pass by<WG1279>, he asked<WG4441> what<WG5101> it<WG5124> meant<WG1498>.
And<WG1161> they told<WG518> him<WG846>, that<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> of Nazareth<WG3480> passes by<WG3928>.
And<WG2532> he cried<WG994>, saying<WG3004>, Jesus<WG2424>, Son<WG5207> of David<WG1138>, have mercy<WG1653> on me<WG3165>.

And<WG2532> they which<WG3588> went before<WG4254> rebuked<WG2008> him<WG846>, that<WG2443> he should hold<WG4623> his<WG846> peace<WG4623>: but<WG1161> he cried<WG2896> much<WG4183> more<WG3123>, Son<WG5207> of David<WG1138>, have mercy<WG1653> on me<WG3165>.
And<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> stopped<WG2476>, and commanded<WG2753> him<WG846> to be brought<WG71> to<WG4314> him<WG846>: and when<WG1161> he<WG846> had come near<WG1448>, he asked<WG1905> him<WG846>,
Saying<WG3004>, What<WG5101> do you desire<WG2309> that I shall do<WG4160> to you<WG4671>? And<WG1161> he said<WG2036>, Lord<WG2962>, that<WG2443> I may receive my sight<WG308>.
And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> to him<WG846>, Receive your sight<WG308>: your<WG4675> faith<WG4102> has saved<WG4982> you<WG4571>.

And<WG2532> immediately<WG3916> he received his sight<WG308>, and<WG2532> followed<WG190> him<WG846>, glorifying<WG1392> God<WG2316>: and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the people<WG2992>, when they saw<WG1492> it<WG1325>, gave praise<WG136> to God<WG2316>.
